ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] In a rut at 40
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes - we were moved to the same Damage Table as Warriors - so we should hit more often and harder.  The increased skill caps obviously won t affect you
ygData.messageBody:
Yes - we were moved to the same "Damage Table" as Warriors - so we should
hit more often and harder. The increased skill caps obviously won't affect
you however,.

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 09, 2001 3:39 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] In a rut at 40


Do the new melee changes affect things pre-50? If so maybe I need to dust
off Kitasi and see how he fares now.

-----Original Message-----
From: John Grady [mailto:john_grady@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 09, 2001 2:33 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] In a rut at 40


I would try fear kiting in DL and see if the new melee changes make that a
more viable option now. Jonathon's, Snare and Fear.

Tz

--- Christopher Sanders <christopher.sanders@...> wrote:

<HR>
<html><body>
<tt>
Ok, I've been 40 for about a month now, and have 2 bubbles to go. 
I'm sick<BR>
of being 40!!<BR>
<BR>
I'm also sick of pickup groups!  Heh.  So, any advice would be
welcome on<BR>
where to go at this level, and what song combination to use to solo me
2<BR>
bubbles as quickly as possible.<BR>
<BR>
I've been using chains-fulfils-tuyens, but it takes so long to kill a
frost<BR>
giant this way...I get bored quickly (hence, 40 for a month...hehe).<BR>
<BR>
Thank you!<BR>
Atonal<BR>
</tt>

<br>
